title: Iceland Lodge Escape under the Northern Lights
description: Experience Iceland’s Hotel Húsafell, a wilderness retreat where the Northern Lights are visible on average three times a week. Named one of the Unique Lodges of the World by National Geographic, expect cosy nights by the fireplace or in the hotel’s steamy geothermal outdoor baths followed by relaxing days exploring the area’s ice caves, lava tubes, glaciers, waterfalls, crystal springs and woodlands.
